EmailTemplate.description: Request for a third party to sign legal agreements to receive no charge licenses
EmailTemplate.name: Legal Agreement Signature Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Implementing MathWorks No Charge Licenses for {!Contact.Account_Name_Latin__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.Name},
My name is Justin Tumeinski and I will be facilitating your no charge MathWorks software. This message outlines what I need you to do prior to setting up the license.
Info Required: Review, sign, and email or fax back the attached agreement(s) to me at 508-652-6978.
If you have any questions, please let me know.
Thank you, -Justin Justin Tumeinski MathWorks No Charge Team partnernocharge@mathworks.com
